Tokens.upgrade_ability_power_shard_active: Reset the cooldown of your most recently used non-ultimate ability.
Tokens.upgrade_ability_refresher_desc: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.
Tokens.upgrade_acolytes_glove_desc: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_active_reload_desc: While reloading, pressing [{s:key_reload}] during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.
Tokens.upgrade_ammo_scavenger_desc:
Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.
At Max Stacks, gain bonus Sprint speed
Tokens.upgrade_arcane_extension_desc: Increases the Duration of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_arcane_surge_desc: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and the next ability you use will have bonus Range, Duration, and Spirit Power. Additionally, you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to {s:AbilityDuration}s.
Tokens.upgrade_banshee_slugs_headshots_desc: Headshots reduce target's Bullet and Spirit Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_berserker_desc: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.
Tokens.upgrade_boxing_glove_desc: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for {s:LifestealHealPercent}% of the Melee Damage dealt plus {s:LifestealHeal}. This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura_desc: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.
Tokens.upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder_desc: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.
Tokens.upgrade_burst_fire_desc: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.
Tokens.upgrade_cardio_calibrator_desc: Reduces the effect of enemy Movement Slow.
Tokens.upgrade_chain_lightning_desc: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.
Tokens.upgrade_chonky_desc: After not taking damage for {s:RestoreDelay}s, gain {s:HealLifePercentOutOfCombat}% Max Health Regen.
Tokens.upgrade_chonky_high_health_passive_desc: When you are above {s:HealthThreshold}% health, you have bonus Weapon Damage and Move Speed.
Tokens.upgrade_cloaking_device_active_ambush_de: Attacking or using an ability will end your stealth and start an ambush, temporarily granting you bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_cloaking_device_active_desc: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.
Tokens.upgrade_close_quarter_combat_desc: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.
Tokens.upgrade_close_range_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.
Tokens.upgrade_cold_front_desc: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits. Deals {s:NPCDamageMult}x Damage to non-Heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_colossus_desc: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the move and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.
Tokens.upgrade_containment_desc:
Deals Spirit Damage, Slows targets movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.
Tokens.upgrade_cooldown_reduction_desc: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_crackshot_desc: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.
Tokens.upgrade_critshot_desc:
Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus weapon damage and Slow on hit.
Bonus damage cannot Crit.
Tokens.upgrade_damage_recycler_desc: Reduces the effect of enemy applied healing reduction.
Tokens.upgrade_debuff_reducer_desc: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.
Tokens.upgrade_diviners_kevlar_desc: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_dps_aura_active_desc: Provides bonus Move Speed and Fire Rate to you and nearby allies.
Tokens.upgrade_dps_aura_desc: Provides Fire Rate to nearby player minions.
Tokens.upgrade_escalating_exposure_desc: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.
Tokens.upgrade_fervor_passive: While you are below {s:LowHealthThreshold}% health, you gain stat bonuses.
Tokens.upgrade_fleetfoot_boots_active_desc: Gain bonus Move Speed and Ammo.
Tokens.upgrade_fleetfoot_boots_passive_desc: Removes the Move Speed penalty while shooting.
Tokens.upgrade_glass_cannon_desc: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.
Tokens.upgrade_glitch_desc: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.
Tokens.upgrade_headhunter_desc: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.
Tokens.upgrade_headshot_booster_desc: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots.
Tokens.upgrade_heal_on_level_desc: When you receive a Boon, automatically heal.
Tokens.upgrade_healbane_desc: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.
Tokens.upgrade_healing_booster_desc: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by {s:HealAmpRegenPercent}% and increases your resistance to healing reduction by {s:DegenResistance}%.
Tokens.upgrade_health_nova_desc: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional {s:HeroTargetBonus}% per ally.
Tokens.upgrade_health_stimpak_desc: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.
Tokens.upgrade_hollow_point_rounds_desc: When you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, deal additional Weapon Damage.
Tokens.upgrade_imbued_duration_extender_desc: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_infuser_desc: Gain Spirit Power and Spirit Lifesteal.
Tokens.upgrade_inhibitor_desc: Your bullets apply Movement Slow and reduce the target's outgoing damage on hit.
Tokens.upgrade_intensifying_clip_desc: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.
Tokens.upgrade_kinetic_sash_desc: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to {s:AbilityDuration}s.
Tokens.upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets_desc: Your Melee attacks heal you for {s:LifestrikeHealPercent}% of the Melee Damage dealt plus {s:LifestrikeHeal}. This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_long_range_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_burst_desc: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal {s:MinimumDamage} damage or more in a single hit.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_carpet_desc: Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away and gain Bullet and Spirit shields.  Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.  While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_reach_desc: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_shield_desc: While you have a Spirit Shield, gain bonus Spirit Power and Cooldown Reduction.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_shock_desc:
Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal {s:MinimumDamage} damage or more in a single hit.
Targets are immune to the effects of Improved Burst for {s:ReProcLockoutTime}s after taking damage from it.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_slow_desc: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Move Speed and Fire Rate reduced.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_storm_desc: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Move Speed and maintain full speed while attacking.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_tempo_desc: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_vulnerability_desc: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.
Tokens.upgrade_medic_bullets_desc: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.
Tokens.upgrade_melee_charge_desc:
Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage and either reload your weapon instantly or give you up to +100% bonus ammo.
Only activates when Bonus Ammo is not full.
Tokens.upgrade_personal_rejuvenator_desc: Respawns the hero at the spot they died.
Tokens.upgrade_phantom_strike_desc: Teleport to an enemy target, dealing damage, applying Disarm, Slow, and pulls them to the ground.
Tokens.upgrade_pristine_emblem_desc: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above {s:EnemyLifeThreshold}% health.
Tokens.upgrade_proc_silence_desc: Your bullets build up a Debuff that briefly Silences and reduces their Spirit Damage. Victims are immune to the build up for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after debuff expires.
Tokens.upgrade_quick_silver_desc:
Imbue an ability with bonus Spirit Damage on the first hit. When the ability is used, your weapon is reloaded and has a Fire Rate bonus for that clip.
Only activates when Ammo is not full.
Tokens.upgrade_rebirth_passive: If you die, after {s:RespawnDelay}s you will respawn at your death location with partial health.
Tokens.upgrade_reduce_debuff_duration_active_de:
Purge all negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, heal yourself and gain a move speed bonus.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
Tokens.upgrade_reduce_debuff_duration_desc: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.
Tokens.upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield_desc: While you have a Bullet Shield, gain Weapon Damage and Fire Rate.
Tokens.upgrade_reinforcing_casings_desc: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.
Tokens.upgrade_rescue_beam_desc: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.
Tokens.upgrade_restorative_locket_active_desc: Consume all stacks to heal target ally and replenish a stamina point. Can be self-cast.
Tokens.upgrade_restorative_locket_passive_desc: When an enemy uses an ability within {s:Radius}m range from you, store one Restoration Stack.
Tokens.upgrade_return_fire_desc: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.
Tokens.upgrade_ricochet_desc: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.
Tokens.upgrade_rocket_booster_desc:
Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.
Cannot be used for {s:InteruptCooldown}s if attacked by enemy Hero.
Tokens.upgrade_rupture_desc:
Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health.
Decay's damage is non-lethal.
Tokens.upgrade_savior_desc: Provide the target with Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Move Speed. Can be self-cast.
Tokens.upgrade_self_bubble_desc: You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform actions. Afterwards you gain move speed, spirit and spirit resist.
Tokens.upgrade_sharpshooter_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.
Tokens.upgrade_silencer_active: For the next {s:AbilityDuration}s, all your bullets immediately apply Silence. Silence prevents targets from using abilities.
Tokens.upgrade_siphon_bullets_desc_passive2: Your bullets temporarily steal Max HP from enemies. Enemies regain their stolen health when the debuff expires. Permanently steal {s:StealPerKill} stacks of health if a siphoned target dies and lose {s:StackLostPerDeath} stacks if you die.
Tokens.upgrade_spellshield_desc: Block the next Spirit Damage or Debuff, preventing its effects. Only regenerates outside of combat.
Tokens.upgrade_spellslinger_headshots_desc: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them. Landing a headshot increases your total Spirit Amp against them.
Tokens.upgrade_spirit_snatch_desc: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, the attack deals extra Spirit Damage and steals Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_superacolytes_glove_desc: After dealing an accumulated {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage, your next Heavy Melee Attack deals an additional {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage.
Tokens.upgrade_superior_stamina_passive: Increases the number of Air Jump, Air Dashes and Wall Jumps that can be performed before landing from 1 to 2
Tokens.upgrade_suppressor_desc: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.
Tokens.upgrade_surging_power_active: Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is not limited by your max magazine size.
Tokens.upgrade_target_stun_desc: Target is knocked down and Stunned after a {s:StunDelay}s delay, interrupting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action. Stun lasts up to 2x longer against airborne targets based on how high off the ground they are (up to {s:MaxHeightForBonus}m).
Tokens.upgrade_targeted_silence_desc:
Fire a projectile which silences and damages the first enemy hero it hits. Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.
Silence Glyph has a lower cooldown if it misses.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_bleed_desc: Imbue an ability to apply slow on a hit target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_damage_pulse_desc: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_defense_shredders_desc: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_overflow_desc: Gain bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power by charging up when shooting enemy heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_range_desc: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_thermal_detonator_desc:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and causes enemies to receive additional Weapon Damage from your team.

Deals {s:NonHeroReductionPercent}% less DPS vs non-heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_toxic_bullets_desc: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their Max Health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.
Tokens.upgrade_unstoppable_desc:
Temporarily suppress negative status effects and become immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
Tokens.upgrade_veil_walker_desc: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, increased Move Speed and restores all Bullet and Spirit Shields.
Tokens.upgrade_vex_barrier_desc: Automatically restores one stamina and deploy temporary Bullet and Spirit Shields when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.
Tokens.upgrade_warp_stone_desc: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_withering_whip_desc: Target an enemy to apply Fire Rate Slow and reduce their Bullet Resist.
